verbs.description: skiing crash at whiteface [V: kills] [ARG1: st lawrence student a senior at st lawrence university] died while skiing saturday morning at whifeface mountain the university announced lukas harvey died in what the university described as a skiing accident he and friends were at the mountain and planned to celebrate easter with harvey family in vermont st lawrence president william fox wrote in a letter on the college website university of otago harvey lukas harvey william fox st lawrence whifeface mountain skiing st lawrence university
